page.title: 04INTERVIEW WITH HEADMASTER
page.content: {..7,APPROXIMATELY HOW MANY PUPILS COME {TO THIS SCHOOL ? THERE ARE EIGHT HUNDRED AND FIFTY PUPILS. {8,DID THIS AMOUNT OF PUPILS COME TO {THIS SCHOOL WHEN IT HAD FIRST BEEN {BUILT ? NO. IN 1963 THERE WERE 322 PUPILS. AND IN 1968 THERE WERE 345 PUPILS. {9,HOW MANY ROOMS ARE THERE IN THE {SCHOOL ? THIRTY SEVEN CLASSROOMS,BUT FORTY ROOMS ALTOGETHER INCLUDING:THE HALL, THE LECTURE THEATRE AND COMMON ROOM. {10,HOW MANY TEACHERS WORK HERE ?} THE ACTUAL NUMBER THE AUTHORITY GAVE WAS 46.5 BUT AROUND FIFTY WORK HERE BECAUSE SOME OF THEM WORK PART-TIME. {11,HOW MANY TEACHERS,TEACH ? A) HUMANITIES-10. B) MATHS -8.
